terms.name: contact affiliation
terms.value: Leibniz-Forschungsinstitut für Molekulare Pharmakologie (FMP), 13125 Berlin, Germany. 2Freie Universität Berlin, Faculty of Biology, Chemistry, Pharmacy, 14195 Berlin, Germany.

description: To identify factors responsible for the differential localization and activity of PIK3C2Bin the presence or absence of serum mitogens we took a quantitative functional proteomics approach based on stable isotope labeling of amino acids in cell culture (SILAC). Genome-engineered HEK293T cells endogenously expressing eGFP-PI3KC15were cultured in serum-containing or serum-deprived media containing heavy or light amino acids, and subjected to affinity capture using a GFP trap matrix and LC-MS/MS

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Wallroth A, Koch PA, Marat AL, Krause E, Haucke V. Protein kinase N controls a lysosomal lipid switch to facilitate nutrient signalling via mTORC1. Nat Cell Biol. 2019 21(9):1093-1101

title: Identification of nutrient dependend PIK3C2B regulators
